tool_description: Get real time pricing for all groceries, food, drinks and products from all UK supermarkets and online stores.
name: UK Supermarkets Product Pricing
title: UK Supermarkets Product Pricing

api_list.name: Single Product Store Prices
api_list.description: Get all store prices of a product by barcode

required_parameters.name: barcode
required_parameters.description: This is the barcode found on the product. EAN, UPC, GTIN are accepted.
